DOC.brief_summary: Brief Summary : 800 RRMS Subjects currently treat Avonex Copaxone randomize either continue current therapy receive Rebif therapy . The subject follow 2 year . The primary objective compare time worsen medium level concern define Canadian Multiple Sclerosis Working Group ( CMSWG ) treatment optimization recommendation .
